description: A sleek, unfathomably-complicated machine covered in dozens of blinking lights, worn on the back by sturdy faux-leather straps.  An electrode dangles from the back, attaching to your forehead.  How it operates without annihilating spacetime isn't quite clear, but a localized portal allows things to be stored in an extradimensional space.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A lightweight armor vest made of pieces of titanium sewn together, with cloth padding for comfort.  Brittle against blunt force, but highly resistant to cuts and corrosion.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Personal portable charging system consisting of an array of quantum solar panels neatly folded in a form of a large backpack.  It can be worn as one, and has an integrated cable to plug it into a cable charger system.  Cutting edge technology.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Unfolded array of portable quantum solar panels ready to push some power into an active cable charger system.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A lightweight steel-reinforced tool carrier.  Keeps your tools safe and about in zero-g, Mars, the bottom of the Pacific, or other generally inhospitable environments.  It has several deep pockets, and two mounting points for pressurized canisters or other large magazines.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
